person.persName: William B. Wadlington (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and 1st lieut 48th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Jane Holmes Wadlington in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 24, 1844. Father of James L. Wadlington. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Jones Wadlington in Caldwell County on February 11, 1846. Father of John M. Wadlington, David B. Wadlington, Mildred M. Wadlington, Isabella Wadlington, Helen B. Wadlington, and William M. Wadlington. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Lyon County in 1860. Farmer in Lyon County in 1863. Served in the 48th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from October 26, 1863, to December 18, 1864.
